improvement_list.improvement_desc: Potential division by zero. Add check to ensure y is not zero before division.
The variable 'y' can be 0 due to the if-else condition in the for loop.  Dividing by 'y' will cause a runtime error if 'y' is 0.  Consider adding a check before this line to ensure 'y' is not 0.
Unreachable code. The loop always assigns a value to 'y', so this assignment to 'z' has no effect.
The loop always assigns a value to 'y', so this assignment to 'z' is unnecessary and can be removed for performance improvement.
Dead code.  This line will never execute because the preceding for loop always sets 'y' to either 0 or 4.
Dead code.  This line will never execute because the preceding for loop always sets 'y' to either 0 or 4.
